casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Juan Carlos RODRIGUEZ 302A14-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 26, 2017 Barbara S. Blackman, John F. Carella, Kathryn L. VandenBerg, Assistant Appellate Defenders, for Rodriguez, Juan Carlos. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jennifer Martin, Patrick B. Weede, Michael Silver, Assistant District Attorneys, Mary Carla Babb, Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney Generals, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of September 2017 by State of NC in the Alternative for Leave to File State's Supplemental Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of September 2017."
